name: trello_search
description: Search for cards, boards, or members in Trello. Returns matching items with names, descriptions, and URLs.

steps.code: const resp = await fetch('/1/search?query=' + encodeURIComponent(`{{query}}`) + '&cards_limit=15&boards_limit=5&modelTypes=cards,boards', { credentials: 'same-origin' }); if (!resp.ok) throw new Error('Search failed: ' + resp.status); const data = await resp.json(); const cards = (data.cards || []).map(c => ({ type: 'card', name: c.name, description: c.desc?.substring(0, 150) || '', board: c.board?.name || '', list: c.list?.name || '', labels: (c.labels || []).map(l => l.name || l.color), due: c.due || '', url: c.shortUrl || c.url })); const boards = (data.boards || []).map(b => ({ type: 'board', name: b.name, description: b.desc?.substring(0, 150) || '', url: b.url || b.shortUrl })); return { query: `{{query}}`, cards_found: cards.length, boards_found: boards.length, cards: cards, boards: boards }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Search via Trello API
